PrecisAppointment of the HONOURABLE JOHN E.D. SAVAGE, to be a Justice of Appeal of the Court of Appeal for British Columbia; and a Judge of the Court of Appeal of Yukon during his tenure of office as a Justice of Appeal of the Court of Appeal for British Columbia.
